files.description: Implements a seeded toy experiment CLI that generates deterministic summary statistics and metadata to results.json and renders a simple plot to figure.png.
Runs the toy experiment twice in isolated temp directories and asserts reproducibility by comparing stable JSON fields and/or a checksum across runs for CI/CD.
Defines Python project metadata and dependencies (e.g., numpy, matplotlib, pytest) and configures test tooling for CI execution.
CI/CD workflow that installs dependencies and runs pytest to validate deterministic artifact generation on each push and pull request.

missionDescription: Implement goal_33 as the first pipeline milestone: generate a toy experiment (seeded) that writes results.json (summary stats + metadata) and a simple plot to figure.png; add a test that compares a checksum or selected stable fields across runs.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
